content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":81041,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずっと俺様の近くにいろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stay close to me at all times.\""},{"lineNumber":81042,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Got it?\""},{"lineNumber":81043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":81044,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, Lord Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":81045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright.\""},{"lineNumber":81046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この世界は俺のだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This world belongs to me."},{"lineNumber":81047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　連中にはやらん」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't let those guys have it.\""},{"lineNumber":81048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「勝つぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We will win.\""},{"lineNumber":81049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............ Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":81050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":81051,"originalJapaneseLine":"全てを白く染める吹雪の中、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the blizzard that dyed everything white,"},{"lineNumber":81052,"originalJapaneseLine":"小さな影が二つ、寄り添う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Two small shadows huddled close together."},{"lineNumber":81053,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは消える寸前の蝋燭の火のように――","translatedEnglishLine":"They flickered like the flame of a candle about to be extinguished——"},{"lineNumber":81054,"originalJapaneseLine":"頼りなく、くすぶり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Fragile, smoldering,"},{"lineNumber":81055,"originalJapaneseLine":"吹雪の中で小さく揺らめいていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"They wavered faintly in the blizzard."},{"lineNumber":81056,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":81057,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":81058,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジノライン、第四区――","translatedEnglishLine":"Maginot Line, District Four——"},{"lineNumber":81059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"....................\""},{"lineNumber":81060,"originalJapaneseLine":"既に、人類と魔物の世界の境界としての","translatedEnglishLine":"Already, it had long lost its role as the boundary between the worlds of humanity and monsters."},{"lineNumber":81061,"originalJapaneseLine":"役割を失って久しい砦の一角で、","translatedEnglishLine":"In a corner of a fortress long since useless for that purpose,"},{"lineNumber":81062,"originalJapaneseLine":"アリオスは静かに目を伏せ、うずくまっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arios quietly lowered his gaze and crouched down."},{"lineNumber":81063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、こんなところにいたんですか、アリオス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, so you were here, Arios."},{"lineNumber":81064,"originalJapaneseLine":"　随分と捜しましたよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've been looking all over for you.\""},{"lineNumber":81065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":81066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ここは、静かだからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's quiet here, after all.\""},{"lineNumber":81067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより、今までどこに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But more importantly, where have you been until now...?\""},{"lineNumber":81068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「情報収集ですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gathering information."},{"lineNumber":81069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また砦が落ちたそうですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, another fortress has fallen."},{"lineNumber":81070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それから村が落ちた街が落ちた、それで――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then a village fell, then a town, and so on——\""},{"lineNumber":81071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、面倒ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, what a hassle.\""},{"lineNumber":81072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つまりバンバン人が死んでまーす。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In other words, people are dying left and right."},{"lineNumber":81073,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はい、報告終わり」","translatedEnglishLine":"Okay, report over.\""},{"lineNumber":81074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":81075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何が言いたいかって言うと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What I want to say is,"},{"lineNumber":81076,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろエスクードソードのモードが","translatedEnglishLine":"it's about time the Escudo Sword's mode"},{"lineNumber":81077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　変わるかも知れないってことです」","translatedEnglishLine":"might change.\""},{"lineNumber":81078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No...\""},{"lineNumber":81079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………もう来た」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's already come.\""},{"lineNumber":81080,"originalJapaneseLine":"エスクードソードが三度輝く。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Escudo Sword glowed three times."},{"lineNumber":81081,"originalJapaneseLine":"その光を、二人は意味ありげに見つめていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two of them gazed meaningfully at that light."},{"lineNumber":81082,"originalJapaneseLine":"「来ましたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's here...\""},{"lineNumber":81083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人類も遂に50％死にましたか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Humanity has finally lost 50%."},{"lineNumber":81084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おめでとう、勇者アリオス。","translatedEnglishLine":"Congratulations, Hero Arios."},{"lineNumber":81085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方の勝ちですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've won.\""},{"lineNumber":81086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「刹那モード……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Setsuna Mode..."},{"lineNumber":81087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今なら――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now--\""},{"lineNumber":81088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":81089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王も殺せる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can even kill the Demon Lord.\""},{"lineNumber":81090,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと俺様の近くにいろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stay close to me at all times."
I won't let those guys have it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てを白く染める吹雪の中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the blizzard that dyed everything white,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さな影が二つ、寄り添う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two small shadows huddled close together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは消える寸前の蝋燭の火のように――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They flickered like the flame of a candle about to be extinguished——

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 吹雪の中で小さく揺らめいていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They wavered faintly in the blizzard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に、人類と魔物の世界の境界としての
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Already, it had long lost its role as the boundary between the worlds of humanity and monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 役割を失って久しい砦の一角で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a corner of a fortress long since useless for that purpose,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスは静かに目を伏せ、うずくまっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios quietly lowered his gaze and crouched down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、こんなところにいたんですか、アリオス。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been looking all over for you."
"But more importantly, where have you been until now...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また砦が落ちたそうですよ。
それから村が落ちた街が落ちた、それで――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then a village fell, then a town, and so on——"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまりバンバン人が死んでまーす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words, people are dying left and right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何が言いたいかって言うと、
そろそろエスクードソードのモードが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's about time the Escudo Sword's mode

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変わるかも知れないってことです」
エスクードソードが三度輝く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Escudo Sword glowed three times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その光を、二人は意味ありげに見つめていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them gazed meaningfully at that light.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おめでとう、勇者アリオス。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can even kill the Demon Lord."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
